Text.text: Understand Your Customers Better Through Usage Tracking!

SAP Usage Tracking tool powered by SAP Lumira technology provides useful visual insights to understand your customers better. With an automated usage tracking mechanism, you can determine how customers use your products or services and make informed decisions on how to improve their value.
It is not just about knowing your customers!

Your product development teams can use SAP Usage Tracking to know more about their product usage and adoption statistics, and also understand their product’s perception in the market. They can make easy and quick decisions on how to improve customer satisfaction levels, derive an optimal product planning process, develop optimal marketing strategies, and much more.
Why Usage Tracking Tool
Improve customer satisfaction:
Use product adoption and usage details to identify any gaps and improve customer satisfaction levels.
Increase revenues:
Increase revenues by adopting usage-based pricing.
Make quick informed decisions:
Improve the product development cycle; easily identify the product migration strategies; quickly identify selling/non-selling product areas, and much more.
Identify focus areas:
Use the product usage details to identify areas of business processes that need more focus and improvements.
Who Can Use the Tool
As a product owner and senior leadership member, you can learn more about:
Which are the most popular modules and features that customers use in your products?
What features should you consider for further enhancement?
What are the users’ requirements and how do they use your software?
How is a new release or support pack adopted?
And much more…
As a marketing professional, you can learn more about:
How customers perceive your product in the market
How many new licenses are added over a period of time
Actual product usage versus solid licenses
Which release base the customers are working with
What is the passive customer base in any given region
And much more…
How to Get Started
It is easy! Only 2 steps are required to start Usage Tracking.
Step 1:
Register your application for the Usage Tracking tool.
Step 2:
Add code snippets for the information that you want to track and collect.
You can find the sample code snippets in the document section.
How to Get Additional Support
We offer Implementation support!
The Usage Tracking Tool supports you with necessary Javascript clients to track any information you need, and also collects statistics that are of interest.
